## Hero Section
**Hi, I'm Nader Elsayed Elnagar**
Software Engineer

Graduated Software Engineering Student passionate about building innovative solutions with modern technologies. Based in Egypt, I specialize in full-stack development with expertise in both backend and frontend technologies.

## About Me
I'm a passionate Software Engineer with a fresh perspective on modern software development. As a recent graduate in Software Engineering, I bring enthusiasm for learning and implementing cutting-edge technologies to solve real-world problems.

My expertise spans across full-stack development, with a strong foundation in both backend and frontend technologies. I enjoy working on complex projects that challenge me to grow and learn new technologies while delivering high-quality solutions.

**Stats:**
- 15+ Projects Completed
- 5+ Technologies Mastered
- 2025 Graduation Year

## Featured Projects

### Footex - Football Management System
Comprehensive football management system with advanced features including match simulation, real-time statistics, user authentication, and live match events using SignalR.
Technologies: C#, .NET Core, SignalR, JWT, Azure Blob
[GitHub Repository](https://github.com/Nader7x/Footex)

### AI Match Simulation Model
AI-powered football match prediction and simulation API with asynchronous processing, webhook callbacks, and real-time notifications during simulation.
Technologies: Python, FastAPI, Uvicorn, Machine Learning, AI
[GitHub Repository](https://github.com/Nader7x/MatchSimulationModel)

### Premier League Stadiums System
Comprehensive Premier League data management system with GraphQL API, Redis caching, MongoDB integration, and Swagger documentation.
Technologies: Node.js, Express.js, GraphQL, MongoDB, Redis
[GitHub Repository](https://github.com/Nader7x/PremierLeagueStadiums)

### Opsphere - DevOps Platform
DevOps management platform with real-time notifications using SignalR, JWT authentication, and comprehensive API documentation with Swagger.
Technologies: C#, .NET Core, SignalR, SQL Server, JWT
[GitHub Repository](https://github.com/Nader7x/DevOpsWebsite)

### Information Retrieval System
Advanced information retrieval system with tokenization, stemming, positional indexing, boolean search, and TF-IDF scoring for document ranking.
Technologies: Python, NLP, Text Processing, Information Retrieval
[GitHub Repository](https://github.com/Nader7x/IRProject)

### Caesar Cipher Implementation
Cryptography project implementing Caesar cipher with both substitution and transposition methods for text encryption and decryption.
Technologies: Python, Cryptography, Security
[GitHub Repository](https://github.com/Nader7x/CaesarCypher)
